xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/371964-Bigbang: Radio Radio TV Sleep 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/kCWSFHRRbDeZruEJOqg2vgIMp08.jpg The main part of this DVD is a concert film that was made during the tour for Radio Radio TV Sleep in January / February 2003. In addition to magical concert moments (both acoustic and electric), we get to meet the band in the tour bus, at sound check and at Youngstorget, Oslo during the demonstration against the war in Iraq. The film has very strong emotions and gives a very good insight into what it's like to experience this band live. Bigbang: Radio Radio TV Sleep
